title: Ramona Shelburne and Royce Young on March 11th, 2020
description:
Zach talks to Ramona Shelburne about the league's shutdown last March. Then Royce Young joins to discuss what it was like to be in the building for the cancellation of last year's Jazz-Thunder game and shares a few thoughts on this year's OKC team.   
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
